entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
